files.README.md:
# chadboyda-agent

A Claude Code marketplace containing plugins and skills for development workflows.

## Installation

### 1. Add the Marketplace

```
/plugin marketplace add chadboyda/chadboyda-agent
```

### 2. Install Plugins

```
/plugin install iterm-worktree@chadboyda-agent
```

## Available Plugins

### iterm-worktree

Git worktree management with iTerm2 integration for parallel feature development.

**Features:**
- Create worktrees with automatic iTerm2 tab/window opening
- Branch from main/master or current branch (`--from-current`)
- Launch Claude in new worktree tabs
- List worktrees with iTerm2 tab status
- Switch between worktree tabs
- Safely close worktrees with validation

**Quick Start:**
```bash
# Create a new worktree
python3 scripts/worktree.py create feature-auth

# Branch from current branch
python3 scripts/worktree.py create feature-fix --from-current

# Create with Claude running
python3 scripts/worktree.py create feature-auth --claude --task "Implement authentication"

# List all worktrees
python3 scripts/worktree.py list

# Switch to a worktree tab
python3 scripts/worktree.py switch feature-auth

# Close a worktree
python3 scripts/worktree.py close feature-auth --delete-branch
```

**Requirements:**
- macOS with iTerm2
- Python 3.6+
- Git

## Manual Installation

If you prefer not to use the marketplace system:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/chadboyda/chadboyda-agent.git ~/.claude/plugins/marketplaces/chadboyda-agent
```

## Credits

The iterm-worktree plugin was inspired by [claude-code-iterm-worktree-mcp](https://github.com/timoconnellaus/claude-code-iterm-worktree-mcp) by [@timoconnellaus](https://github.com/timoconnellaus).

## License
